scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-openclaw/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-openclaw/cli run build && pnpm --filter @minions-openclaw/docs run build && pnpm --filter @minions-openclaw/web run build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-openclaw/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-openclaw/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-openclaw/cli run lint
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter @minions-openclaw/docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod --no-build
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter @minions-openclaw/web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod --no-build
scripts.deploy: pnpm run deploy:docs && pnpm run deploy:web
